RumorFact.Text: A Nomai recording on one of the solar towers on Ash Twin described plans to relocate Ember Twin's solar panels due to issues with its current site.
The Nomai planned to relocate the solar panels on Ember Twin to a grassy plateau on the surface, directly above the Sunless City.

ExploreFact.Text: A grassy plateau on Ember Twin's south pole that the Nomai scouted as a potential relocation site.
The Nomai planned to relocate something here to keep it safe from Ash Twin's shadow depriving them of energy during sunless days.

AltText.Text: The Nomai planned to relocate Ember Twin's solar panels here, to prevent Ash Twin's shadow from depriving them of energy during sunless days.

ExploreFact.Text: Sunless days happen during a solar eclipse.
